page.title: 12The bypass -good or bad ?
page.content: The bypass road to take traffic away from the village has been wanted for years but it has not been known whether it would go on the St.Dennis or Newquay side of Indian Queens.In May 1985 rumours began to get about that the route for the bypass would start from the Kelliers and cut across below the school behind the Suncrest Estate.This would mean that the A392 road joining Indian Queens to St. Columb Road would have to have a flyover or an underpass,and that the two places would be divided.The school would be on one side,with the council estate on the other as well as the houses and shops at St.Columb Road.A farm and bungalow would have to be knocked down in St.Francis Road to make way for the new road.Plans are due to be shown in Spring 1986,and there could be trouble.
